query.statement: SELECT A.CODE, A.CODE_NAME, A.SORT_SEQ, nvl(B.PHF,'N') PHF FROM SCC_COMMON_CODE A, ( SELECT '001' CODE,PHF_MGMT1 PHF FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_CD=(SELECT RECIPE_CD FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_NAME=#RECIPE_NAME# AND RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD#) UNION ALL SELECT '002' CODE,PHF_MGMT2 PHF FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_CD=(SELECT RECIPE_CD FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_NAME=#RECIPE_NAME# AND RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD#) UNION ALL SELECT '003' CODE,PHF_MGMT3 PHF FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_CD=(SELECT RECIPE_CD FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_NAME=#RECIPE_NAME# AND RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD#) UNION ALL SELECT '004' CODE,PHF_MGMT4 PHF FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_CD=(SELECT RECIPE_CD FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_NAME=#RECIPE_NAME# AND RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD#) UNION ALL SELECT '005' CODE,PHF_MGMT5 PHF FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_CD=(SELECT RECIPE_CD FROM FSR_STD_RECIPE_MST WHERE RECIPE_NAME=#RECIPE_NAME# AND RECIPE_CD = #RECIPE_CD#) ) B WHERE A.USE_YN='Y' AND A.GROUP_CODE='FS0018' AND A.CODE=B.CODE(+)
